Detailed Description

Provides specific methods for Group table entries

Definition at line 36 of file Group.php.

Member Function Documentation

Group::__construct (  BDDRecord $  newRec  ) 
 

Initialises Site from the BDDRecord $newRec. If $newRec is NULL, Group is empty. Sets IsValid to false.

Parameters:
$newRec a BDDRecord to copy/cast or NULL

Definition at line 140 of file Group.php.

Group::Validate (  $  siteTable  ) 
 

Tries to validate the Site in order to save it into DataBase.

Parameters:
$siteTable a BDDTableSite object (where BDD should be replaced by your current Database : eg. MySQLTableSite). A valid BDDTableSite implements TableSiteInterface
Returns:
- NULL if object has been validated

- an Errors object in case of error(s) :

GroupError::GROUP_NAME_EMPTY if property TableGroup::TABLE_COLUMN_NAME is empty

BDDError::TABLE_CLASS_INCORRECT if $groupTable is not a valid instance

GroupError::GROUP_IDSITE_INEXISTANT if property TableSite::TABLE_COLUMN_IDSITE refers to a non existant site
